entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one that Harry's scar is reacting to. The text states 'As Voldemort’s anger throbbed inside him...'

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the prisoner who has been caught by Greyback and his group. The text states 'Fenrir Greyback! We’ve caught Harry Potter!'

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a werewolf who is part of the group that has caught Harry Potter. The text states 'You know me!’ There was resentment in the werewolf’s voice.'

entities.name: narcissa malfoy
entities.description: Narcissa Malfoy is mentioned as a woman who is scrutinizing Harry's scar. The text states 'Through his puﬀy eyelids Harry saw Narcissa Malfoy scrutinizing his'

entities.name: scabior
entities.description: Scabior is mentioned as a person who is part of the group that has caught Harry Potter. The text states 'If you look a bit closer, you’ll see ’is scar. And this ’ere, see the girl? The Mudblood who’s been traveling around with ’im, ma’am.'

entities.name: greyback's group
entities.description: Greyback's group is mentioned as the ones who have caught Harry Potter. The text states 'We’re here to see He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named!’

relationships.description: Voldemort's anger is causing Harry's scar to react. The text states 'As Voldemort’s anger throbbed inside him...'
